actions-list.header: On motion to table the motion to reconsider Roll Call 514

actions-list.actionItem: Mr. Cicilline moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
Perlmutter moved to reconsider the vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table. Objection heard.
On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (Roll no. 513).
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1510, the House proceeded with one hour of debate on the Nadler motion to concur in the Senate amendment to H.R. 8404.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1510, Mr. Nadler moved that the House agree to the Senate amendment.
The House proceeded with one minute speeches which by direction of the Chair, would be limited to 5 per side of the aisle.
The Chair designated Ms. Spanberger to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Ritchie Torres to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
